title: Le Golose Imperfezioni
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Macrobiotic, Organic, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The first bio bakery and cafe in Como where tradition, design and old recipes are standard. Bread is handcrafted and then baked in a wood oven. Serves desserts and lunch also. Cakes, breads, cookies and focaccia are mostly vegan, as well as wine and beer. Has gluten free choices. Wi-Fi. Is also a concept store.
